persons: Ali bin al-Hussein, Prince of Jordan
subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: From a dawn raid at a five-star hotel to a man hurling stacks of money at Sepp Blatter, the FIFA scandal has had it all.
snippet: From a dawn raid at a five-star hotel to a man hurling stacks of money at Sepp Blatter, the FIFA scandal has had it all.
